input_text:
Job Title: New Home Purchase Coordinator

Location: Farmington Hills, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Headquarted in Farmington Hills, Michigan, RHP Properties (www.rhp.com) is the nation's largest private owner and operator of manufactured home communities. With more than 300 communities throughout 30 states, we continue to expand our footprint to provide accessible and affordable housing across the country. All of this would not be possible without the energy and drive of our talented team members! We invest in our team members, with regular training, opportunities for advancement, and fun events to bring everyone together.
We are presently seeking a New Home Purchase Coordinator in Farmington Hills, MI who will Perform administrative and general office duties under the supervision of the Director of Community Operations Support of Newbury Management Company.
As a New Home Purchase Coordinator, you will:Facilitate the overall flow of paperwork required for new home purchases.Keep RHP Pipeline updated with all datapoints in a timely manner.Review submitted quotes from plant to ensure pricing and home specifications are consistent with RHP standardsRoutine communication with plants to ensure that we are receiving quotes, offline dates, new floorplans and home deliveries in a timely manner.Send weekly “New Home Update” email to leadership team to keep them informed of pending items and current offline lead times.Work with designer to implement new décor packages and ensure the current décor is updated in RHP Pipeline.Work with plant to request and implement new floorplans or modifications to existing floorplans.Ensure floorplans, community preferences and plant contact information are kept current in RHP Pipeline.Report functionality issues discovered with RHP Pipeline to Supervisor.Thoroughly review new IT functionality to ensure updated or new Pipeline features are working correctly and as intended.Data entry of Form 309 information into the HAF system.Provide back up to other NOA team members due to absence or workload.Provide general and administrative assistance to the Regional Managers.Perform other duties or special projects as assigned.
Job Requirements:A minimum of 3-5 years of administrative assistant experience required.High school diploma or GED required.Proficiency of MS Office, specifically Word, Excel, Outlook, and AccessExcellent communication, organizational and customer service skills.Ability to perform independently and interact with all levels of personnel, specifically senior management.Detail orientated, time management and follow thorough skills.Ability to multitask and be a team player in a fast-paced environment.Basic mathematical skills
Compensation:This is a full-time opportunity with competitive compensation. Benefits include medical, dental and vision insurance; short-term and long-term disability; life insurance; paid time off and holidays; flexible spending; and 401k.

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: New Home Purchase Coordinator
output_json.summary: RHP Properties seeks a New Home Purchase Coordinator in Farmington Hills, MI.
job_responsibilities: Facilitate the overall flow of paperwork for new home purchases
Review and ensure consistency of plant quotes
Communicate with plants for quotes, offline dates, new floorplans, and deliveries
Send weekly 'New Home Update' email to leadership
Work with designer on décor packages
Ensure floorplans, community preferences, and plant contact info are current
Provide backup to other NOA team members
General and administrative assistance to Regional Managers
Perform other duties or special projects as assigned
output_json.company_information: RHP Properties is the nation's largest private owner and operator of manufactured home communities, with over 300 communities in 30 states.
